refnamediv.refpurpose: Monitor available disk space. Send warnings if disk space drops bellow predefined value.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: &dhpackage; connect to running APCUPS daemon. It allows display of an APC UPS as RTS2 device. It can switch vote for bad weather if system is on battery for some time, battery level drops bellow specified percentage or remaining battery time drops bellow specified number of seconds.
